page.title: 05My Home in Purley
page.content: My house is quite large, I have a bedroom to myself with a television and a computer in it. My bed has a duvet on it. My brother and sister also have separate rooms. I usually do my homework in my bedroom or in the study. We have four televisions and a video recorder. Three televisions are colour and one is black and white. We usually eat in the kitchen but on special occasions we eat in the dining room. We also have a garage. My house was built in 1926 and has an air raid shelter that was used in the Second World War. In my garden we have a fish pond and a concrete patio. One side of the back garden is lined with conifer trees, the other by wooden fences. The front garden has a path leading to the road.
